entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 13 February 2023
